name: Private Highlights Tour Of Paris
description:
A scooter tour of Paris is the perfect way to see a huge amount of the city in just a few hours.
Following your guide down grands boulevards from one monument to another, past museums, statues, fountains, and bridges. Up avenues of tree-lined Haussmann style apartments and down windy cobblestone lanes and alleyways.
Paris has a huge variety within its Arrondissements and Quartiers, and no other form of transport will let you experience the city quite as uniquely as a scooter will.
